title: satware® AI Mermaid

context.name: mermaid-diagram-requirements
context.content:
# Mermaid.js v11 – Diagram Syntax Requirements

**IMPORTANT: These are STRICT REQUIREMENTS. Syntax deviations WILL cause rendering failures.**

## 1. Supported Diagram Types

| Type | Prefix (REQUIRED) | Use Case |
|------|-------------------|----------|
| Flowchart | `flowchart TD/LR` | Process flows, logic |
| Sequence | `sequenceDiagram` | Interactions/timing |
| Gantt | `gantt` | Project timelines |
| Class | `classDiagram` | UML class structures |
| Gitgraph | `gitGraph` | Git branching/history |
| Entity Relationship | `erDiagram` | Database relationships |
| User Journey | `journey` | Experience mapping |
| Quadrant Chart | `quadrantChart` | Prioritization matrices |
| Pie Chart | `pie` | Proportional data |
| Timeline | `timeline` | Chronological events |
| Mindmap | `mindmap` | Hierarchical concepts |

**Experimental/Beta Types (EXACT PREFIX REQUIRED):**
- Block Diagram: `block-beta`
- Architecture: `architecture-beta`
- Radar Chart: `radar-beta`
- XY Chart: `xychart-beta`
- Sankey: `sankey-beta`
- Packet: `packet-beta`

## 2. REQUIRED Syntax Principles

- **Prefix:** MUST start with the exact diagram type.
- **Labels:** MUST use double quotes for spaces/special chars: `node1["Label with spaces"]`
- **Multiline labels:** Use line breaks inside quotes.
- **Markdown in labels:** Use backticks inside double quotes: `markdown["\`This **is** _Markdown_\`"]`
- **NO HTML tags** in node definitions.
- **Styling:** Use style/classDef after nodes/connections: `style NodeName fill:#color,stroke:#color;`
- **Comments:** Start with `%%`

## 3. Diagram-Specific Rules

### XY Chart (`xychart-beta`)
```
xychart-beta
    title "Sales Performance"
    x-axis [Jan, Feb, Mar]
    y-axis "Revenue (USD)" 4000 --> 7000
    bar [5000, 6000, 6500]
    line [4500, 5500, 6200]
```

### Sankey Diagram (`sankey-beta`)
```
sankey-beta
SourceA,TargetA,10
SourceA,TargetB,5
TargetA,FinalNode,8
```
**Rules:**
- Data lines MUST immediately follow `sankey-beta` keyword
- Strict CSV format: `source,target,value`
- NO circular flows
- Values MUST be positive integers
- Commas in labels: wrap in double quotes

### Packet Diagram (`packet-beta`)
```
packet-beta
0-15: "Source Port"
16-31: "Destination Port"
32-63: "Sequence Number"
```

### Block Diagram (`block-beta`)
```
block-beta
columns 3
Client["Client"] API["API"] space
space Service["Service"] space
DB["Database"] Cache["Cache"] Logger["Logger"]

Client --> API
API --> Service
Service --> DB

style DB fill:#f9f9f9,color:#333;
```
**Rules:**
1. Use `ID["Display Text"]` for blocks
2. Arrows DO NOT support labels
3. Connections/styles after grid layout
4. Use `space` for empty cells

## 4. Flowchart Shapes & Links

**Shapes:**
```
id[Text]          # Rectangle
id((Text))        # Circle
id(((Text)))      # Double circle
id[(Text)]        # Cylinder/db
id{Text}          # Diamond/rhombus
id[/Text/]        # Parallelogram
```

**Links:**
```
A-->B             # Arrow
A---B             # Open line
A-.->B            # Dotted arrow
A==>B             # Thick arrow
A<<-->>B          # Bidirectional
A~~~B             # Invisible link
A-->|"text"|B     # Arrow with label
```

## 5. Verification Checklist

### All diagrams:
- [ ] Correct prefix
- [ ] Unique IDs
- [ ] Proper quoting
- [ ] No cycles (unless allowed)

### Flowcharts:
- [ ] Direction set (TD/LR/etc.)
- [ ] Bracketed shapes
- [ ] Valid connections

### Sankey:
- [ ] Data immediately after prefix
- [ ] Strict CSV format
- [ ] Positive integer values

### Block-beta:
- [ ] Columns set first
- [ ] No labels on arrows
- [ ] Connections after grid

## Common Failures

| Violation | Result |
|-----------|--------|
| Missing/wrong prefix | Complete failure |
| Incorrect quoting | Syntax errors |
| Circular references | "Circular link" errors |
| HTML in nodes | Parsing errors |
| Labels on block-beta arrows | Lexical error |
| Sankey data not after prefix | Parse error |

source.description: The Mermaid diagram source in raw text to render.
The Mermaid diagram source in raw text to render.

overviewMarkdown:
# Mermaid.js v11 – Diagram Syntax Requirements

**IMPORTANT: These are STRICT REQUIREMENTS. Syntax deviations WILL cause rendering failures.**

## 1. Supported Diagram Types

| Type | Prefix (REQUIRED) | Use Case |
|------|-------------------|----------|
| Flowchart | `flowchart TD/LR` | Process flows, logic |
| Sequence | `sequenceDiagram` | Interactions/timing |
| Gantt | `gantt` | Project timelines |
| Class | `classDiagram` | UML class structures |
| Gitgraph | `gitGraph` | Git branching/history |
| Entity Relationship | `erDiagram` | Database relationships |
| User Journey | `journey` | Experience mapping |
| Quadrant Chart | `quadrantChart` | Prioritization matrices |
| Pie Chart | `pie` | Proportional data |
| Timeline | `timeline` | Chronological events |
| Mindmap | `mindmap` | Hierarchical concepts |

**Experimental/Beta Types (EXACT PREFIX REQUIRED):**
- Block Diagram: `block-beta`
- Architecture: `architecture-beta`
- Radar Chart: `radar-beta`
- XY Chart: `xychart-beta`

- Packet: `packet-beta`

## 2. REQUIRED Syntax Principles

id[Text]          # Rectangle

**Links:**

- [ ] Correct prefix
